definition: insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: I hear you now saying, “What has inner detachment to do with success?
sentences.chinese: 你们说，“淡定跟成功有什么关系？

sentences.english: And she made a variety of Sichuan dishes easily that even local chefs are impressed.
sentences.chinese: 她淡定地烧出各种四川佳肴，连当地名厨都折服。

sentences.english: Mrs Bruni-Sarkozy is pregnant with her second child and has been rather quiet about it.
sentences.chinese: 现正布吕尼正怀有她的第二个小孩，对此她相当淡定。

sentences.english: Unable to bear lonely past, a light rain began work, calm and stable.
sentences.chinese: 耐不住往昔的落寞，小雨开始作祟，从容而淡定。

sentences.english: Calm is a kind of life conservation, innocence is a character dictates.
sentences.chinese: 淡定是一种人生涵养，纯真是一种性格使然。

sentences.english: From his self-introduction, we felt his connotation and pursuit in condescendence, affection of the club in his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 眼神的淡定自如，草草扫过就透出对俱乐部的情切。

sentences.english: As he left, Ben spoke of a “calm chaos.
sentences.chinese: 本要离开的时候，说了句“淡定的混乱”。

sentences.english: It is calmly thin to settle of run about in club building of office, you, is just necessary.
sentences.chinese: 从容淡定的行走于会所之中，你，才是不可或缺的。

sentences.english: Heart, already sit under the bodhi tree, a lotus, be calm and empty.
sentences.chinese: 心，已经坐在菩提树下，一羽莲花，传诵淡定的空寂。

sentences.english: Preparing a bento can be a peaceful experience.
sentences.chinese: 总之，是一种平和淡定的体验。

sentences.english: May you be more calm when facing the acquisitive society.
sentences.chinese: 愿你在急功近利的社会里多一份淡定与从容。

sentences.english: Read the calm, just calculate understand the life.
sentences.chinese: 读懂了淡定，才算懂得了人生。

sentences.english: Actually, there is kind of easy and calm beauty when her sermon .
sentences.chinese: 其实，她讲经时就有种从容淡定的美。

sentences.english: Do you know how to calm down Hegrid's The Monster Book of Monsters?
sentences.chinese: 你知道怎样让海格的《妖怪们的妖怪书》淡定下来吗？

sentences.english: And the stoicism and orderliness of the Japanese public impressed the entire world.
sentences.chinese: 日本公众的淡定与秩序给整个世界留下深刻印象。

definition: cool and collected (idiom); showing no sign of nerves/perfectly composed
to remain calm in the face of events (idiom)
to handle the situation calmly (idiom)/unruffled/to treat the situation lightly
see 泰然處之|泰然处之[tai4 ran2 chu3 zhi1]
neither servile nor overbearing (idiom)/neither obsequious nor supercilious
Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
